title: Hellblade: Senua's Sacrifice
notes: Graphics work out of the box (and actually adding the option "PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command%" as other suggested breaks them for me). Gamepad detected without problems. However it has audio issues (chirping and quiet voices). Workaround: Edit the wine prefix for the game and add an override for xaudio2_7 (native).

title: Holdfast: Nations At War
notes: textures of bodies missed just saw heads with weapons lmao and menu not really accessible in game btw

title: Holdfast: Nations At War
notes: ok the parameter "PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command%" do the trick and solve problems of missed body's texture
